name: bitgo-express-server
description: BitGo Express local signing server (REST API)

scripts.up: docker compose up -d && npm run list
scripts.up:dev: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d && npm run list
scripts.up:dev:mac: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.mac.yml up -d && npm run list
scripts.env: docker exec bitgo-express-prod printenv | grep BITGO
scripts.env:dev: docker exec bitgo-express-dev printenv | grep BITGO

author: Edy Ionescu <errorsmith@gmail.com>
